import './Select.css' import "@fontsource/poppins"; import React from 'react'; import photo from '../../../assets/photo-sats.png' import minibig from '../../../assets/minibig.png' import sats from '../../../assets/sats.jpg' export default function AboutUsComponent() { return (

ABOUT US

MINIMAXIS

Minimaxis was born to facilitate bitcoin smart contracts,

as they are the new frontier to be overcome and democratized

and I hope that we will be able to overcome this barrier.

SATSHACK

WINNERS

We won the Satshack hackathon at the biggest bitcoin

event in Brazil, SatsConf!

) };
